mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO at_pur_ret ( FID, FBillType, FFactoryType, FDepID, FDepNumber, FDepName, FDate, FSupplierID, FSupplierNumber, FSupplierName, FReason, FRemark, FCreateBy, FCreateDate, FUpdateBy, FUpdateDate, sync_flag, sync_time ) VALUES
( #{item.FID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FBillType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FFactoryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FDepID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FDepNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FDepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.FSupplierID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FSupplierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FSupplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FCreateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.FUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.sync_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sync_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE FID = VALUES(FID)
